arabicText: ثُمَّ ٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًۭا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Then	lift	your	gaze	again,	your	gaze	will	return	
towards	you,	unsuccessful	and	weak.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	do-bāra	nigah	utha	nazar	teri	taraf	na
kām	palat	āayegi	thaki	māndi

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًۭا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	We	have	beautified	the	lower	
heaven	with	lamps,	and	have	made	them	
weapons	against	the	devils,	and	have	kept	
prepared	for	them	the	punishment	of	the	
blazing	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak	ham	ne	neeche	ke	āasmān	ko	
chiraghoñ	se	āarāsta	kiya	aur	unheiñ	
shaitānoñ	ke	liye	mār	kiya	aur	unke	liye	
bhadakti	āag	ka	‘aƶāb	tayyār	farmāya

arabicText: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
And	for	those	who	disbelieved	in	their	
Lord,	is	the	punishment	of	hell;	and	what	a	
wretched	outcome!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Jinhoñ	ne	apne	Rab	ke	sāth	kufr	kiya	
unke	liye	jahannam	ka	‘aƶāb		hai	aur	kya	hi	
bura	anjām.

arabicText: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًۭا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ
englishTranslationText:
They	will	hear	it	hissing	when	they	will	be	
thrown	into	it,	and	it	is	boiling.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	us	meiñ	dāle	jāyeñge	uska	reñkna	
(Chinghadna)	suneñ	ge	ke	josh	mārti	hai.

arabicText: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌۭ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
As	if	about	to	explode	with	rage;	whenever	
a	group	is	thrown	into	it,	the	guardians	of	
hell	will	ask	them,	“Did	not	a	Herald	of	Warning	come	to	you?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Māloom	hota	hai	ke	shiddat-e	ghazab	meiñ	
phat	jāyegi	jab	kabhi	koi	giroh	us	meiñ	dāla	
jāyega	uske	dārogha	unse	poocheiñ	ge	kya	
tumhāre	pās	koi	dar	sunāne	wāla	na	āaya	
tha?
